pullrequest.title: Player is not available on Xenial

content.raw:
Aww, poor player. @_jrivero_ , if I want to fix the build of player, what's my shortest path to getting an environment set up for testing? Do I need to run Debian, or would it be sufficient to make it build on Xenial?

(You should still merge this PR to drop player support in gazebo. Hopefully we can revive it again later.)
content.html:
